name: Blur It
tagline: Blur sensitive info with ease
description: Hide sensitive information like texts, images, forms on a webpage with ease.

name: VibeScan
tagline: Ship AI code with confidence.
description: You built your app with AI but is it safe, fast, and bug-free? That's where VibeScan comes in. Upload your code. Find all the problems. Fix issues with one click. Ship AI code with confidence!

name: Guided Learning in Gemini
tagline: From answers to understanding
description: Guided Learning is a new mode in Gemini that helps you learn and study by building a deep understanding instead of just getting answers.

name: Jamocracy
tagline: Build your Spotify playlist together
description: Jamocracy is the ultimate spotify music/playlist tool that makes parties and events more fun! Let guests vote on songs, keep the vibe alive, and stay in control of your playlist. Perfect for parties, weddings, and any gathering.

name: Veltos.ai
tagline: Create games & 3D models with just a prompt
description: Veltos lets you create stunning 3D worlds and games using natural language. No coding needed. Turn ideas into immersive experiences instantly.

name: Debian 13 "Trixie"
tagline: The rock-solid OS that powers the internet, now even better
description: Meet Debian 13 "Trixie"! The rock-solid OS that powers the internet, now supercharged. Features a new Linux kernel for better performance, modern dev tools, and legendary security. 100% free, community-built, and ready for your most critical tasks.

name: ShellDef
tagline: Shell script analyzer to scan, detect, + protect
description: Stop copy-pasting risky shell commands. ShellDef scans and analyzes scripts in seconds—highlighting threats, bad practices, and vulnerabilities, then delivers a clean, corrected version ready to copy and use safely.

name: BeSpoke AI Stylist (Early Access)
tagline: Turns your clothes into confidence
description: BeSpoke AI Stylist ends closet guesswork, sync your wardrobe to auto-organize, let AI Stylist curate looks from what you own, wake up to Outfit of the Day, Virtual Try-On previews, Mix & Match pieces, save to Lookbook, and invent fresh fits with AI Designer.

name: Bold and Easy Coloring Pages
tagline: 200+ bold and easy coloring pages, free to print
description: Explore 200+ bold and easy coloring pages with thick outlines and large shapes. Instant PDF downloads, no signup, perfect for kids & adults alike.

name: Aidee
tagline: Your 24/7 AI That Gets Life Done for You
description: Aidee is your AI concierge & work assistant—handling real-world tasks via phone calls and powering productivity with automation. From bookings and errands to content creation and strategy, Aidee is your complete 24/7 AI workforce.

name: Plonky
tagline: Free physics puzzle game | play online unblocked
description: Play this free physics puzzle game online - the ultimate ragdoll physics adventure! Master physics mechanics, solve creative puzzles, and conquer 50+ challenging levels. No download required, play instantly in your browser!

name: YooAI
tagline: All-in-One Platform with Advanced Models, no subscriptions
description: YooAI brings together the most advanced AI models — like Veo3, Kling and more — all in one place. Most features are free and require no login. Only a few advanced models are pay-as-you-go — no subscriptions, ever.

name: coloruv
tagline: A minimal natural color picker
description: A minimal interactive color picker that transforms your screen into a living palette.

name: PageZero AI
tagline: Learn Any Skill. Powered by AI.
description: PageZero AI helps you learn any skill 10x faster using less than 20 interactive prompts with instant feedback. No videos. Just real learning. Mobile-first, gamified, and built for busy modern learners.

name: Foundee
tagline: Find your startup co-founder
description: Now with AI-powered co-founder matchmaking and a new "Explore Startups" feature where anyone can discover and apply to join early-stage startups.

name: Simplr
tagline: Planner, Reminder & Widgets
description: Simplr is a minimalist task manager and daily planner that works 100% offline. No sign-ups, no distractions - just a clean, secure space to organise your day. With smart reminders, widgets, and themes, Simplr simply works.

name: Human Moments
tagline: Mindful challenges and journaling-no pressure, no tracking
description: Human Moments helps you feel better with daily mindful challenges, lists and private journaling.. No accounts, no ads, no tracking, no pressure — just meaningful prompts and tools to support better habits, self-reflection, and well-being. DM for a free promo.

name: ChatGPT5.so: Free GPT‑5 Online
tagline: Free using ChatGPT5 Online With ChatGPT5.so
description: ChatGPT5.so gives you free access to OpenAI’s most powerful model — GPT5 — with no sign-up required. Whether you're writing, coding, researching, or just exploring, ChatGPT5.so lets you experience next-generation AI directly in your browser, anytime, anywhere.

name: Manuscript AI
tagline: AI-powered in-depth Analysis of your book in minutes for $49
description: Manuscript AI delivers a comprehensive, structured assessment of your non-fiction book. It analyzes your writing style, tone, clarity, and readability; then generates detailed, actionable feedback to help you strengthen your draft. All for just $49 per review.

name: MAS Design
tagline: A collaborative multi-agent system builder with canvas.
description: MAS Design lets you build, connect, and share multi-agent systems on an interactive canvas with reference support. It’s an open-source community directory to explore and collaborate on agent-based models, ideal for researchers, educators, and developers.
